section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: At Golobe, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our travel booking platform.

section2.title: Information We Collect
section2.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
section2.item1: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
section2.item2: Payment information (credit card details, billing address)

section3.title: How We Use Your Information
section3.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process your bookings, send you confirmations and updates, respond to your requests and inquiries, and personalize your experience on our platform.

section4.title: Information Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our platform, airlines, hotels, and other travel service providers to complete your bookings, and law enforcement when required by law.

section5.title: Data Security
section5.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

section6.title: Contact Us
section6.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@golobe.com

q1.question: How do I book a flight?
q1.answer: You can book a flight by using our search feature on the homepage. Enter your departure and destination cities, select your travel dates, and choose from available flights. Follow the booking process to complete your purchase.

q2.question: What is your cancellation policy?
q2.answer: Cancellation policies vary depending on the airline, hotel, or service provider. You can find specific cancellation terms during the booking process and in your booking confirmation email.

q3.question: How do I modify my booking?
q3.answer: To modify your booking, log in to your account and go to 'My Bookings'. Select the booking you want to change and follow the modification process. Please note that changes may be subject to fees.

q4.question: Is my payment information secure?
q4.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment information. We never store your complete credit card details on our servers.
